description.narrative: This activity (European Development Fund (EDF)10 Payments) is a component of European Development Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £2,441,780,941. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Sectors not specified. , with the following implementing partners: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development, European Investment Bank. The start date is 12-11-2008 and the end date is 31-12-2020.
